After launching 5 lxc containers we can realize that each one use an specific
virtual interface.

After reconfiguring lxc bridge
lxdbr0
to use the address

we
get and inconsistent routing table.

Another problem is the default gateway was replaced by a virtual interface and
my host can't resolve any internet address. To solve this issue I set the
correct gateway again.

props.code:
ip route del default
route add default gw 192.168.15.1 dev wlp3s0

children.value:
ip route del default
route add default gw 192.168.15.1 dev wlp3s0
Then setting the containers to use the bridge

props.code:

default via 192.168.15.1 dev wlp3s0

192.168.15.0/24 dev wlp3s0 proto kernel scope link src 192.168.15.19 metric 600
